subject: Parrot Bug Summary
body:

Numbers

Created this week: 13
Closed this week: 14

New Issues

New issues that have not been responded to yet

1 - 2 weeks old
43174 [TODO] Figure out why -libpath: needs to be removed from $linkflags and
      $ldflags (config/inter/progs.pm)

      pmc.pm?

      make.pm)

43164 [TODO] update RESPONSIBLE_PARTIES
43151 [TODO] Set compiler optimisation flag depending upon compiler version

      darwin.pm)

      jit.pm)
